meta.article_title: July 18, 2011 - The Mental State of a Looper Against a Push

mental-state-looper-push.probleme: Mental state for looping against a push

debutant.nom: Loop forehand or backhand depending on the push
debutant.description: Use the mid-point between forehand and backhand as a reference for where to loop. Favor forehand if it's a strong push, but be ready to backhand loop if necessary.

exercices_complementaires.description: Set up to loop forehand, then quickly switch to backhand if the push goes there. Repeat this process.

metriques_progression.reps: 10-15 reps per side with a focus on quick reaction time and good footwork
metriques_progression.time: 30 seconds to 1 minute rest between reps

erreurs_a_eviter.erreur: Not anticipating the push and being caught off guard
